item.title: Python and RStudio
item.description: Python This is an example of Python code from some SDS348 homework. Python is a general-purpose coding language that can be used for different types of programming and software development besides web development. For more information, visit https://www.python.org/. def howlong(s): if len(s) < 5: print(s, "is shorter than 5 characters") elif len(s) < 10: print(s, "is >5 and <=10 characters") else: # this else goes with `len(s) < 30`, NOT with `len(s) < 50` print(s, "is 10+ characters") howlong("homework") ## ('homework', 'is >5 and <=10 characters') Here is an example of reticulate using R and Python Here is some python code:
